valueProposition.title: Discover what Matbakh can do for you:

forSingles.title: For Singles & Cooking Enthusiasts:
forSingles.point1: Impress on your next date with perfect recipes tailored to your needs.
forSingles.point2: Effortlessly create seasonal and sustainable weekly or monthly meal plans – stress-free and delicious.
forSingles.point3: Never again ask 'What should I cook today?' – Matbakh inspires you daily.

forGastronomes.title: For Gastronomes & Professionals:
forGastronomes.point1: Playfully build a solid resource plan step by step – without complicated ERP systems.
forGastronomes.point2: Optimize your inventory management with AI support and flexibly adapt it to real conditions – save time and reduce waste.
forGastronomes.point3: Focus on what you love: cooking and delighting your guests. Matbakh takes care of the rest.
